page.title: 05Farming
page.content: {continued from page 4 { {May:}Usually all young cattle and cows that have calved are out on the grass.Spread nitrogen on winter barley and also spray it for weeds. {June:}Prepare for start of silaging.It takes about a week to put sides on trailers and check machinery and make silage pit ready.Hope for a weeks good weather to get it cut and in the pit. {July:}This is the month we all try to take our holidays to fit in with end of silage and before the start of the harvest.The bulls are put out with the cows in the first week. {August:}Check combine is in good order. Start combining winter barley, and then winter wheat and finally spring barley. {continued on page 11
